title: Distributive Property Explanation
text: The distributive property is defined as when you multiply a number by a sum or difference, you have to multiply each term of of the sum or difference by that number.
speech: The distributive property is defined as when you multiply a number by a sum or difference, you have to multiply each term of of the sum or difference by that number.

title: Multiplying Individual Terms

title: Simplification
text: Simplify like terms in the sum. Like terms are terms of the same degree.
